backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles, worker profiles, bookings, and access control with various query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing roles of various frontend files across components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH‑based theme tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount element and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, authentication guards, theming, and page structure using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user lacks permissions, with navigation back to browsing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAcco: Guard that checks whether the user has selected an account type and redirects to onboarding if not.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard that waits for Internet Identity initialization and redirects unauthenticated users to sign‑in.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based route guard that restricts access to pages based on the user's account type.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Displays a list of bookings with status, details, and a link to view each booking, or shows an empty state card.
Maps booking statuses to labels and badge variants and renders a status badge.
frontend/src/components/bookings/CreateB: Form for creating a booking request with date, job details, and location fields.
Layout wrapper providing top navigation, main content area, and a footer.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar showing links based on account type and login state with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card component displaying a worker’s profile summary, category, rate, and link to full profile.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerPr: Form for creating or editing a worker profile including category, description, service area, rate, and active status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccountType.ts: Hook that fetches the current user profile and exposes account type-related flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client creation, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, worker profiles, workers list, and bookings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with a custom earthy color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/BookingDetail.tsx: Displays a single booking’s details, worker info, and allows clients or workers to update booking status.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseWorkers.tsx: Lists active workers with filtering by category and sorting options, including a hero section and UI filters.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboard.tsx: Shows a client’s upcoming and past bookings with navigation to browse workers.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingAccountType: Guides new users through selecting an account type and entering their name before saving their profile.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Provides a sign‑in screen using Internet Identity and redirects authenticated users to browsing workers.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDashboard.tsx: Displays the worker dashboard with profile-completion status and lists bookings grouped by status using fetched worker data.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerDetail.tsx: Shows detailed worker info, lets clients create bookings, and handles loading and missing-profile states.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerProfile.tsx: Provides a form for workers to create or update their profile, handling both creation and editing flows.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the app's UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the current HandyConnect MVP features, versions, and requirement mappings.
